sentences.english: To study the effect of pine pollen on the high blood-fat level model experimental animals.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究破壁松花粉對高血脂模型動物血脂的影響。

sentences.english: To study the effect of pine pollen on the high blood-fat level model experimental animals.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究破壁松花粉對高血脂模型動物血脂的影響。

sentences.english: This product has the lipid, promoted whitening, reduce weight of the health care function.
sentences.chinese: 本品具有調節血脂，去斑美白，減肥的保健作用。

sentences.english: Serum TC level is a sensitive contacting biomarker of excessive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 血脂爲高碘接觸的最敏感指標。

sentences.english: Conclusion Deep-sea fish oil has the function of moderating blood lipid.
sentences.chinese: 結論深海魚油具有調節血脂作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Atorvastatin is similar in curative effect and safety to Xuezhikang.
sentences.chinese: 結論血脂康與阿託伐他汀降脂療效與安全性相似。

sentences.english: The relationship of apolipoprotein gene and polymorphisms to dyslipidemia got people's highly attention.
sentences.chinese: 載脂蛋白基因多態性與血脂異常的關係備受人們關注。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effects of Xuezhiqing Capsule on the lipid metabolism in the hyperlipidemia rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察血脂清膠囊對高脂大鼠脂質代謝的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the nutrients of Acaudina leucoprocta and explore its hypolipidemic effect.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析海地瓜的營養成分，探討其降血脂功能。

sentences.english: Objective To study effect of Sambucus willamsii Hance fruit oil on reduce plasma lipids.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究接骨木果油是否具有降血脂作用。

sentences.english: TG levels increased along with the increasing of age but HDL-C levels decreased.
sentences.chinese: 個別年齡組男女兒童間血脂水平有差別。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Xiaoyu pill on hyperlipidemia with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察消瘀丸對2型糖尿病血脂異常的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of alkaline electrolysed water on blood-lip- id.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鹼性電解水對血脂的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of the wild Russula virescens from Yunnan in blood lipid regulation and antioxidation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討雲南野生青頭菌的調節血脂及抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Both in HD and PD patients, serum homocysteine had no significant correlation with lipid.
sentences.chinese: 兩者的血清同型半胱氨酸與血脂均不存在相關關係。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the changes of erythrocyte immunologic function in patients with primary hyperlipoidemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討原發性高血脂症紅細胞免疫功能的變化。
